result.execSummary:
All charges against Antonio Tyrone Blue in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Antonio Tyrone Blue is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Antonio Tyrone Blue

records.addlTxt: Notice of Completion of Representation.  Received and Filed.  nk
On motion of the State filed 04/21/2022, Court ordered case dismissed.
Motion to Dismiss  received and filed

Defendant Antonio Tyrone Blue in court with attorney Ashley Fard.  Patrick T. Franken appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Arraignment. All parties appeared via zoom.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty.  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 9, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision Report 04-05-2022

Defendant Antonio Tyrone Blue in court with Attorney Ashley Fard; both appear by video.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Court took judicial notice of 21CF3229. Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Detective D. Galione. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed; defendant given a copy, waived reading. Defense requests an arraignment. Case is adjourned to Branch 16.  Arraignment scheduled for April 6, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision Report 03-18-2022
Attorney Ashley Fard received and filed

Defendant Antonio Tyrone Blue in court by video.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. SPD to appoint Attorney Ashley Fard pending a conflict check. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision Report 03-09-2022

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

11:37 AM Defendant Antonio Tyrone Blue in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Defendant Antonio Tyrone Blue in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Antonio Tyrone Blue appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Grayson, Branch 16. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  Defense enters a plea of NOT GUILTY as to misdemeanor count 2.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
